QuestData.Title: Saving Centaur
QuestData.Description:
The treachery of the Nokhud knows no limits! Only craftsmen live in the village of Daruukhan. They stood no chance against the raiders.
We desperately need your help, $n. The Nokhud are still nearby, and we must tend to the wounded!
Search the village, and carry any survivors you find to me. We will triage and stabilize who we can!
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue injured centaurs in the village of Daruukhan.
QuestData.RewardText:
That... that seems to be everyone!
Taivan! That was incredible! I had no idea he had this in him!

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Selbekh to call Taivan if he is missing
